file.title: Text image relation

p.text: It defines position of text on the object relative to the image (text is in front of the image or on the left of the image, etc.).

p.textAll: All available text and image positions are described in Quick fill words -> Text image relation.

sample.sampletitle: Variants of how button text and image position can be set:
sample.samplecode: Window1.Button1.Text image relation = "On top" Window1.Button1.Text image relation = On left Window1.Button1.Text image relation = Window1.Button2.Text image relation Window1.Button1.Text image relation = Window1.Text1.Text
